name: Sneaky Snake (Boban Games Studio)
description:
Be the most Sneaky Snake. Check out this cool neon style snake game. Try to go thorough all levels at three difficulty levels! Complete quests and avoid death from the murderous walls!

Compare your resoult with your friends to decide who is king of freaking sneaky snakes.

(For the best experience play the download version (not web))

Follow us on our social media:

https://www.facebook.com/Boban-Games-Studio-118182073315245/
https://www.instagram.com/bobangamesstudio/
